column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I really enjoyed my meal and the service at Bavette's
column2: but I gave it only 3 stars for a few reasons. First
column3: I had really high expectations from what I've heard about the restaurant
column5: it wasn't the best I've had in Chicago. Also
column6: when I made reservations weeks in advance
column7: I could only get in at 10:45. When we got there around 10
column8: half the place was empty. We realized we could have gone much earlier and got a seat. Third
column9: everyone around us seemed to have bread right away (which we were begging for because by 10:45
column10: we were starving). We had to ask our waitress
column11: but we figured it should have been brought right away.
